headline.main: GERMANS FORTIFY POSITION IN LIBYA; Wadi Zemzen's Natural Defenses Being Augmented for What Is Seen as Mere Delay

lead_paragraph: WITH THE BRITISH EIGHTH ARMY, in Libya, Dec. 31 (Delayed) -- At Wadi Zemzem two roughly parallel defensive systems are under construction. This suggests that the Axis forces plan a determined stand. There are indications also that the morale of the German elements, at least, has received a new lease on life.
